title.rendered: Halloween Fun in Perry + 20% Off Toys Ends Soon

content.rendered:
Halloween Fun in Perry, GA!

Join us for Treats & Sweets on Downtown Streets in Perry on Halloween! Dress up and trick-or-treat with your family. Kids can compete in the Children’s Costume Contest! Businesses along Carroll St. (including Gottwals Books) will be passing out candy!

Schedule:

4:00 P.M. – 6:30 P.M. Trick-or-Treating

6:00 P.M. Costume Contest on the Square

Costume Contest Age Groups:

0-3, 4-7, 8-12

Last Day for 20% OFF Toys is Halloween!

Where in the World is…

We’ve been talking to families from coast to coast who want to open a Walls of Books store… where will the next one be?

Are you interested in opening your own Walls of Books franchise? Learn more!

Just a Little Thursday Morning Fun!
